outline:
1. to burn, be hot, be scorched, be charred
    1. (Qal)
      1. to be hot, be scorched
      2. to burn, be burned
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be scorched, be burned
      2. to burn
      3. to be dry, be angry
    3. (Pilpel) to cause to burn
strongs_def: to glow, i.e. literally (to melt, burn, dry up) or figuratively (to show or incite passion)
